name: gapminder-igno-survey-process-scripts
description: Gapminder Igno Survey Process Scripts for specific Google Spreadsheets

scripts.deploy: npm run format && npm run build && npm run push && npm run docs && npm run lint
scripts.docs: typedoc --theme markdown --excludeExternals --externalPattern "**/node_modules/**" --mode file --ignoreCompilerErrors --out docs --gitRevision v$npm_package_version --readme none --hideBreadcrumbs --name "Gapminder Igno Survey Process Scripts" src
scripts.push: cp .clasp.tpl.json .clasp.json && clasp setting scriptId "1Om9ff0iaCnshdrQ2XMNXHz-pW-2PST3TXGsNSbyLvCMFsyzH6V6TX5Y1" && clasp push
scripts.push:prod: cp .clasp.tpl.json .clasp.json && clasp setting scriptId "1N19ztz9YFWpqybkijCs38YHSp2vX0I11P3VXXbDk8Iad_SQI1GxQLCAA" && clasp push
scripts.watch: watch 'npm run build && npm run push' src/
scripts.test: npm run format && npm run test:ava && npm run build && npm run docs && npm run lint

author: Gapminder Foundation
